titles.title: Condemning the Government of the Islamic Republic of Iran for executing human rights activists.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/3/2010--Introduced. Expresses support for all Iranian citizens who work for the development of human rights in Iran. Condemns the government of the Islamic Republic of Iran for the executions of Mohammad Reza Ali-Zamani and Arash Rahmanipour and condemns all violence committed by the government of Iran or pro-government militias against Iranian citizens for their pursuit of human rights.
